DOC.brief_summary: To compare the intraocular pressure(IOP)-lowering efficacy of morning or evening instillations of a combination IOP-lowering therapy in patients with open-angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: A 6-week Safety & Efficacy Study of Combination Intraocular Pressure-lowering Therapy in Patients With Open-angle Glaucoma or Ocular Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Adult patients of any race and either sex with open angle glaucoma or ocular hypertension.
